snippet: Among the suggestions from John Tanzella, a travel adviser, is to check whether a company respects the rights of its own gay employees.
abstract: Travel Q&A with John Tanzella, president of the International Gay and Lesbian Travel Association, in which he recommends ways that gay, lesbian, bisexual or transsexual travelers can find destinations and travel companies that are gay friendly.
lead_paragraph: Among the suggestions from John Tanzella, a travel adviser, is to check whether a company respects the rights of its own gay employees.

headline.main: Finding Gay-Friendly Tour Operators and Places
headline.print_headline: John Tanzella on Gay-Friendly Tour Operators and Places.

keywords.value: International Gay and Lesbian Travel Assn
keywords.name: organizations
